full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA GCIG 'DOD PA KHAMS KYI DBANG MO SHO MO 'DEBS TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(MO'I NGO BO RNAMS NGES LEGS PAR BSTAN ZIN LA, ,SPOS PA'I MTHA' BCOD PA'I PHYIR MO ZUR BRTAG PAR 'DOD NA 'BYUNG BA @008B SO SO DANG 'DRE BA'I LHA MO ^ 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO'I 'KHOR RNAMS KYIS SMOS PA'I LUNG BSTAN 'DI SHES PAR BYA STE, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR MNGON SHES ZHUGS SO BKRA SHIS, ,LEGS SO, ,ZHUS DAG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
